name: Labyrinth Takes Greedy Dwarves
description:
A top-down shooter featuring a Dwarf driven by greed. Mine ore, craft pickaxes, and fight hordes of goblins! Can you sacrifice everything to escape the labyrinth?

Intoxicated by a scent you cannot ignore, you choose to forget the cautionary tales of greedy dwarves who have perished in their search for Mithril. You find it at last! Upon striking the Mithril, the ground crumbles beneath your feet and you fall into a labyrinth of rock and stone. Controls
  • Mouse Movement to aim
  • Left Mouse Button to attack / interact / drop item
  • Scroll Wheel to change equipment slot
  • F10 to toggle mute
  • F11 to toggle full screen
Attributions

  • FogHorn-Barge by Daniel Simon
